entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. 40 percent chance of rain showers this afternoon. Snow level rising to 1300 metres this afternoon. High 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing this evening. Snow level 1300 metres. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 14 April 2023
